tool.name: StreamEntryExits

param.name: Output_folder
param.dialogReference: Specify the path for the output folder.

param.name: Study_area_mask
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input study area mask shapefile. Even if the uphill/upstream contributing areas were included in the preprocessing stage, this input should only be the study area mask itself.

param.name: Stream_network
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input stream network shapefile generated using the Preprocess DEM tool.

param.name: Flow_accumulation_raster
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input flow accumulation raster. This can be found in the output folder of the Preprocess DEM tool.

param.name: Flow_direction_raster
param.dialogReference: Specify the path and filename of the input flow direction raster. This can be found in the output folder of the Preprocess DEM tool.

tool.summary: This tool uses a mask of the study area, a stream network, a flow accumulation raster, and a flow direction raster to produce a map showing the points where streams enter and exit the study area and the corresponding watersheds. It also uses this information to identify the main outlet point of the catchment or study area.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool uses a mask of the study area, a stream network, a flow accumulation raster, and a flow direction raster to produce a map showing the points where streams enter and exit the study area and the corresponding watersheds. It also uses this information to identify the main outlet point of the catchment or study area.
